snippet.title: Virtual Boy Longplay [13] Nesters Funky Bowling (3D)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty

The video is a 3D representation of the game running on a Virtual Boy (Via Emulation). Please make use of the 3D button to switch between 3D viewing methods including 3d monitor,anaglyph, noglasses or even plain ole 2D.

For Red/Blue anaglyph you should also enable Greyscale mode. If the 3D effect isn't working, or its hard to focus, try the swap left/right option.

A short game/longplay.  The shortness probably makes it the best suited game for the Virtual Boy considering every game recommends you take a rest every 15 mins.

Aiming the ball and getting a strike is much more difficult then in Virtual Bowling.  There is no auto shot setup, and your aim needs to be dead on.

I've shown 3 runs.

00:00:00 First run, trying to show a few of nesters animations
00:04:01 Second run, I go for the 300 point perfect.
00:06:44 Challenge mode.  I should have spent more time with it and aimed for perfect but....oh well ;) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
